sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Note">83f60c3e1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbaa</category> <github_id>49</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/49</github_url> <message>g_form.getGlideUIElement does not work on portal and g_form.getField does not work on normal UI. Both the functions are used to get information related to fields/variable.  For example, to get sysid of variable on catalog, you might have to do something like this. https://gist.githubusercontent.com/iamkalai/c56b8fae9e2cae8b5bbefe132903ec88/raw/3ce2d0325e489863a02cfa7e4cd1d701bb1a44b4/Get%2520Variable%2520ID.js</message> <number>TIL0001044</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-01 19:38:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cdc0e64f1b0dd4908ed631d7dc4bcb73</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>g_form's getGlideUIElement, getField</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
